skills.name: Install Pinia
skills.pattern: npm install pinia

skills.name: Create Pinia
skills.pattern: import { createPinia } from 'pinia'; const pinia = createPinia(); app.use(pinia)

skills.name: Define Store
skills.pattern: import { defineStore } from 'pinia'; export const useCounterStore = defineStore('counter', { state: () => ({ count: 0 }), getters: {}, actions: {} })

skills.name: Setup Store
skills.pattern: export const useCounterStore = defineStore('counter', () => { const count = ref(0); const double = computed(() => count.value * 2); function increment() { count.value++ }; return { count, double, increment } })

skills.name: Define State
skills.pattern: state: () => ({ count: 0, user: null, items: [] })

skills.name: Access State
skills.pattern: const store = useCounterStore(); store.count; store.user?.name

skills.name: Mutate State
skills.pattern: store.count++; store.user = { name: 'John' }

skills.name: $patch
skills.pattern: store.$patch({ count: 10, user: { name: 'Jane' } }); store.$patch((state) => { state.items.push(newItem) })

skills.name: $reset
skills.pattern: store.$reset() // reset to initial state

skills.name: Define Getter
skills.pattern: getters: { doubleCount: (state) => state.count * 2, fullName: (state) => `${state.firstName} ${state.lastName}` }

skills.name: Getter with Params
skills.pattern: getters: { getUserById: (state) => (id) => state.users.find(u => u.id === id) }

skills.name: Access Other Getters
skills.pattern: getters: { doubleCount() { return this.count * 2 }, quadrupleCount() { return this.doubleCount * 2 } }

skills.name: Define Action
skills.pattern: actions: { increment() { this.count++ }, async fetchUser() { this.user = await api.getUser() } }

skills.name: Async Actions
skills.pattern: actions: { async fetchData() { this.loading = true; try { this.data = await api.get() } finally { this.loading = false } } }

skills.name: Call Other Actions
skills.pattern: actions: { increment() { this.count++ }, incrementTwice() { this.increment(); this.increment() } }

skills.name: $subscribe
skills.pattern: store.$subscribe((mutation, state) => { console.log(mutation.type, mutation.storeId) })

skills.name: $onAction
skills.pattern: store.$onAction(({ name, args, after, onError }) => { after((result) => console.log(name, 'done')) })

skills.name: Pinia Plugin
skills.pattern: pinia.use(({ store }) => { store.customProp = 'value'; store.$subscribe(() => {}) })

skills.name: Persist Plugin
skills.pattern: npm install pinia-plugin-persistedstate; pinia.use(piniaPluginPersistedstate)

skills.name: Persist Config
skills.pattern: defineStore('user', { state: () => ({}), persist: { storage: sessionStorage, paths: ['user'] } })

skills.name: Use Other Stores
skills.pattern: actions: { async checkout() { const userStore = useUserStore(); const cartStore = useCartStore(); await api.checkout(userStore.id, cartStore.items) } }

skills.name: storeToRefs
skills.pattern: import { storeToRefs } from 'pinia'; const { count, user } = storeToRefs(store) // keeps reactivity

skills.name: mapStores
skills.pattern: import { mapStores } from 'pinia'; computed: { ...mapStores(useCounterStore) } // this.counterStore

skills.name: mapState
skills.pattern: computed: { ...mapState(useCounterStore, ['count', 'user']) } // this.count, this.user

skills.name: mapActions
skills.pattern: methods: { ...mapActions(useCounterStore, ['increment']) } // this.increment()

skills.name: Vue DevTools
skills.pattern: Pinia integrates automatically with Vue DevTools

skills.name: Test Store
skills.pattern: import { setActivePinia, createPinia } from 'pinia'; beforeEach(() => { setActivePinia(createPinia()) }); const store = useCounterStore()

skills.name: SSR Support
skills.pattern: In Nuxt 3: useState and Pinia work together; use store in setup()

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.pattern: interface State { count: number; user: User | null }; state: (): State => ({ count: 0, user: null })

skills.name: Hot Module
skills.pattern: if (import.meta.hot) { import.meta.hot.accept(acceptHMRUpdate(useCounterStore, import.meta.hot)) }
